name: AXCategoricalDataAxisDescriptor
desc: An object that represents an axis of categorical data.

items.name: init(title: String, categoryOrder: [String])
items.desc: Creates a categorical data axis with the specified title and an array of categories in the specified order.

items.name: init(attributedTitle: NSAttributedString, categoryOrder: [String])
items.desc: Creates a categorical data axis with the specified attributed title and an array of categories in the specified order.

items.name: var categoryOrder: [String]
items.desc: A list of every category value for the axis in the order they appear visually in the graph or legend.
